name: simple-commands-mcp
description: A configuration-driven MCP server for running developer commands and tools

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:server: esbuild src/server.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/server.js --format=esm --sourcemap --banner:js='import { createRequire } from "module";const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);'
scripts.build:cli: esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/cli.js --format=esm --sourcemap --banner:js='import { createRequire } from "module";const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);' && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node\nimport("./cli.js");' > dist/simple-commands-mcp && chmod +x dist/simple-commands-mcp
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
